subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Pavel Datsyuk banked in a shot from a bad angle off Chicago defenseman Nick Leddy for the winning goal in overtime, bringing the Red Wings to a victory over the host Blackhawks.
snippet: Pavel Datsyuk banked in a shot from a bad angle off Chicago defenseman Nick Leddy for the winning goal in overtime, bringing the Red Wings to a victory over the host Blackhawks.
